job_tasks.phrase: building Software Solutions to enable our internal and external clients.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the core activity of developing software applications for clients, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with our clients to make optimal use of technology during these complex processes
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of technology solutions to meet client needs, a key aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Junior Full Stack Developer the activities that you will be working on include:
job_tasks.justification: This introduces a list of core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Working on Internal tool development and external client projects;
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the development of software tools and projects for both internal and external use.

job_tasks.phrase: Working as part of Agile development teams;
job_tasks.justification: Refers to the methodology used in software development, indicating a focus on the development process.
This is a fundamental software development task, specifically creating user-facing applications.

job_tasks.phrase: work on Data Analysis projects using Python (FastAPI, Django), Javascript (React) and SQL and NoSQL;
job_tasks.justification: While it mentions data analysis, the core of the phrase is about using programming languages and databases, which are tools for software development and data handling.

job_tasks.phrase: Learning and using Git for version control;
job_tasks.justification: Git is a standard tool for version control in software development, fitting into MLOps/Data Pipelines as a foundational element.

job_tasks.phrase: Completing the documentation tasks as expected by the Project/Product team.
job_tasks.justification: Documentation is a standard part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: As you work on Projects / Products you are expected to learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product;
job_tasks.justification: This relates to understanding the business context for the software being developed.

job_tasks.phrase: work with in multidisciplinary teams (including deals & technical accounting experts, ERP & technology specialists, software developers and data analysts)
Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development of various consulting skills.
job_tasks.justification: This involves mentoring and developing others, a key communication and collaboration skill.

job_tasks.phrase: You are motivated to complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time.
job_tasks.justification: Shows a commitment to learning and completing training, indicating adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: work with in multidisciplinary teams (including deals & technical accounting experts, ERP & technology specialists, software developers and data analysts)
Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development of various consulting skills.
You are motivated to complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks such as building web applications, internal tool development, and client projects using standard programming languages and frameworks. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The role is clearly within the scope of Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering) and does not involve any tasks from Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization).

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on traditional full-stack software development. There are no mentions of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
